lubricate_caster.description: Lubricate the caster of the chair to ensure smooth rotation.

check_caster_condition.description: Check the condition of the caster of the chair.

clean_caster_surface.description: Clean the surface of the caster to remove dirt or debris.

fix_caster.description: Fix the caster of the chair if it's not rotating smoothly.

inspect_caster.description: Inspect the caster of the chair.

rotate_caster.description: Rotate the caster of the chair.

clean_caster.description: Clean the caster to ensure smooth rotation.

StatusComplete_caster.description: Assuming caster is already properly installed.

lubricate_wheel.description: Lubricate the wheel of the chair to facilitate easy movement.

check_wheel_condition.description: Check the condition of the wheel of the chair.

clean_wheel_surface.description: Clean the surface of the wheel to remove dirt or debris.

adjust_wheel_rotation.description: Adjust the rotation of the wheel if it's not moving properly.

inspect_wheel.description: Inspect the wheel of the chair.

rotate_wheel.description: Rotate the wheel of the chair.

clean_wheel.description: Clean the wheel to ensure smooth rotation.

StatusComplete_wheel.description: Assuming wheel is already properly installed.

adjust_seat_orientation.description: Adjust the orientation of the chair seat to ensure comfort.

check_seat_condition.description: Check the condition of the seat of the chair.

clean_seat_surface.description: Clean the surface of the seat to ensure hygiene.

fix_seat.description: Fix the seat of the chair if it's wobbly or not stable.

inspect_seat.description: Inspect the seat of the chair.

rotate_seat.description: Rotate the seat of the chair.

clean_seat.description: Clean the seat for hygiene purposes.

StatusComplete_seat.description: Assuming seat is already properly installed.

check_chair_leg_condition.description: Check the condition of the chair leg.

clean_chair_leg_surface.description: Clean the surface of the chair leg.

adjust_chair_leg.description: Adjust the chair leg if it's not even or stable.

inspect_chair_leg.description: Inspect the chair_leg of the chair.

maintenance_chair_leg.description: Check the stability of the chair leg.

clean_leg.description: Clean the chair leg to maintain the appearance.

clean_chair_leg.description: Clean the chair leg to remove dust or any other particles.

StatusComplete_chair_leg.description: Assuming chair leg is already properly installed.

full_chair_cleanup.description: Perform a full cleanup of the chair, including all parts.

full_chair_checkup.description: Perform a full checkup of the chair, inspecting all parts for any potential issues.

lubricate_all_rotating_parts.description: Lubricate all rotating parts of the chair (caster, wheel, seat) to ensure smooth operation.

clean_chair.description: Clean the entire chair, including the caster, wheel, seat, and chair leg.

rotate_chair_parts.description: Rotate all parts of the chair including the wheel, seat, and caster to make sure they are working smoothly.

chair_maintenance.description: Do a general maintenance of the chair including checking all parts and cleaning it.

inspect_whole_chair.description: Inspect the entire chair, including the seat, wheel, caster, and chair leg.

clean_chair_leg_and_caster.description: Clean the chair leg and caster of the chair.

clean_seat_and_wheel.description: Clean the seat and wheel of the chair.

clean_whole_chair.description: Clean the entire chair including the seat, wheel, caster, and chair leg.

rotate_whole_chair.description: Rotate all the parts of the chair that can rotate including the seat, wheel, and caster.

clean_all.description: Clean all the parts of chair including seat, wheel, caster, and chair leg.

maintain_chair.description: Assuming all the parts of chair including seat, wheel, caster, and chair leg are properly installed and functioning well.
